div.bibl: Osadne Hlasy, Feb. 10, 1933. A STAGE PERFORMANCE BY THE LADIES AUXILIARY

body.p: St. Elizabeth Society, Branch 367 of the First Catholic Slovak Ladies Union is sponsoring a stage performance. The play, "Julia's Luck," will be presented February 12, at seven o'clock in the Harmony Hall, 4359 W. Thomas Street. The play is very interesting and educational. The actors and actresses are experienced in this type of work, and the public is assured of an enjoyable evening. The proceeds will go into the organization's treasury.
